As we annouced previously, BioGUID.org has been incorporated into the Global Names suite of indexes and services. Within two days of this happening, we recieved some wonderful news: BioGUID.org won second place in the GBIF Ebbe Nielsen Challenge! Weâ€™re very excited about this recognition, and it re-inforces our decision to incorporate BioGUID into the GNA system. You can follow continuing developments on the new BioGUID Blog.
